category.name: Workflow
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: INBOX_hide_suspended_tasks
preference.preference_description: Valid values are 0/1/2/3. 0 - Default condition to show Started & suspended tasks in the tasks to perform. 1 - Condition to show Only Started tasks in the tasks to perform. 2 - Suspend All Started Tasks of this job. Show Started & suspended tasks in the tasks to perform. 3 - Suspend All Started Tasks of this job. Show Only Started tasks in the tasks to perform. Also suspend all other started tasks of the job.
